QAPair.Question: What is (are) Congenital heart defect - corrective surgery ?
QAPair.Answer: Congenital heart defect corrective surgery fixes or treats a heart defect that a child is born with. A baby born with one or more heart defects has congenital heart disease . Surgery is needed if the defect could harm the child's long-term health or well-being.
